title: Claudette Lucien in Zürich | Jetzt Termin vereinbaren | EMR
description: Claudette Lucien in Zürich | Mehr erfahren über das Behandlungsangebot dieser Praxis und einen Termin vereinbaren.
sitename: Claudette Lucien in Zürich | Jetzt Termin vereinbaren | EMR
text:
Tätigkeitsbereich
Nutritional Therapy
metabolic balance®
GAPS™ (Gut and Psychology/Physiology Syndrome) Practitioner
Areas of special interest include: gut health, mental health, rheumatoid arthritis, skin conditions, weight management and metabolic balance® (supporting a healthy metabolism); as well as this, I offer a wide range of nutritional intervention on other areas of health
Ausstattung
Tanita MC-780 body composition analysis (Detailing: Weight, BMI, BMR, Fat %, Fat Mass, Fat Free Mass, Visceral Fat, Total Body Water, Desirable Body Fat % Ranges, Metabolic Age)
Collaborating with various laboratories and medical doctors for blood testing, digestive stool analysis etc.
Behandlungssprachen
Deutsch / Englisch / metabolic balance® program can be provided in English, German or various European languages
Erreichbarkeit
Lift oder Erdgeschoss / Parkplatz in der Nähe / nah bei Bus oder Bahn
Ausbildungen
MSc Personalised Nutrition
Research dissertation title: Intestinal permeability and inflammatory bowel disease: the pathogenic role of TNF-α, and probiotics as a potential therapeutic intervention.
FdScDiploma in Nutritional Therapy
Research dissertation title: Can probiotics be considered a therapeutic tool in the treatment of irritable bowel syndrome?
Certified metabolic balance® coach
Certified GAPS™ practitioner
Certified NLP (Neuro-linguistic programming) practitioner
Verbandszugehörigkeiten
Approved by:
EMR - Erfahrungs Medizinisches Register
ASCA - Schweizerische Stiftung für Komplementärmedizin
Member:
BANT - British Association for Applied Nutrition and Nutritional Therapy
Beim EMR registriert
seit Juni 2012
